name: Erase It: Delete One Part
description:
Use your imagination to solve all the puzzles. Each level has a unique puzzle in which
you have to guess which part to erase.


Game features:
- New interesting mechanics!
- Relaxing gameplay.
- A large number of different puzzles.
- Beautiful and original graphics.
- Free hints.
- Ability to play without internet.
- Regular updates.


Download the game right now and complete exciting puzzles!
